title: Episode 285: Chitlins and Pig Feet (Feat. E-40 & Too $hort)
itunes:title: Episode 285: Chitlins and Pig Feet (Feat. E-40 & Too $hort)
description:
This week, legendary rappers, E-40 and Too $hort are here to promote their latest albums, as well E-40’s line of wine and tequila. The group discuss a range of topics including the differences between E-40 being with his high school sweetheart, while Too $hort was out here playing the field. This was happening all while they were on tour together, as well as being friends in the industry. Did you know 40 and Short were friends long before they started rapping? E-40 opens up about his Scorpio side, and Too $hort gives some special tips on how to date taller women. Enjoy!
